ing: 1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and minced, or to taste
1/4 teaspoon Mexican-style chili powder with lime (such as TajinÂ® fruit seasoning)
des: "I made this cream cheese-based dip to go with tortilla chips at a lakeside BBQ.  When I checked to see if it was a success, I found the bowl nearly empty and people wiping it with their fingers - I guess you could say finger licking good."
ins: Stir the cream cheese, sour cream, jalapeno pepper, salsa verde, red salsa, onion, lime juice, and chili powder seasoning together in a bowl until well blended. Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour before serving.
